title: its320
author: its320
content: Hello, im new to the whole crypto game but ive stumbled upon an business idea for a crypto exchange app for everyday transactions as apple pay. I have a lot more of this figured out but need help filling in some holes. Anyone with insight into crypto exchange or app development interested in seeing what im cooking up private message me.

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: Quote from: its320 on December 30, 2022, 03:37:12 AMAnyone with insight into crypto exchange or app development interested in seeing what im cooking up private message me. Why not share your ideas publicly instead? Tell the community what you want to do and how you want to do it. That way you can get feedback and insights from people who are experienced in app and website development. Maybe your idea is good but could become even better when it's discussed. Maybe it's awful and will never work but the feedback you receive could make you take a different path.

comments.author: JanEmil
comments.body: I have helped an exchange to start up and worked for them 3 years. Was the best crypto job I ever had. Would love to help a new project.

comments.author: its320
comments.body: I would love to just post my business plan on here to get peoples advice. The problem with that is that my business plan is unique and can be easily be launched by someone with more experienced than me. Im all for being transparent and sharing innovating  ideas to the community but I wouldn't appreciate someone just taking it and claiming its theirs. I hope yall understand and if you're curious about it just message me ill be happy to share my business plan.

comments.author: Mr. Magkaisa
comments.body: - If that's what you're thinking, mate, why don't you at least tell me the idea you have about the crypto exchange? So what kind is it? is it centralized or decentralized?And these are some of the guidelines that you can follow if you want to create your crypto exchange in this industry,QuoteStart Your Crypto Exchange1. Get legal counsel to ensure licensing requirements are met.2. Get venture capital.3. Find a technology solution provider.4. Connect your exchange with others for additional liquidity.5. Partner with a payment processor.6. Implement security best practices.7. Go live through beta testing.8. Start the marketing and PR campaign.9. Be careful about providing customer support.10. Maintain a legal team for ongoing compliance.source: https://www.modulusfe.com/products/data-servers-exchanges/how-to-start-a-bitcoin-exchange-business/

A good idea needs to be out there. People need to see it, hear it, read about it, and have its name and brand stuck in their head. If not, they are just going to run to something else they see that is shouting louder than you saying how good they are.

comments.author: joniboini
comments.body: Quote from: its320 on December 31, 2022, 06:13:19 PMMy plan is to create an app like paypal for people to make online transactions with venders. The app would only host one main coin that I would like to create as a  safecoin for people to use as currency for the venders. Why the need to limit the app to one coin? I don't think there's enough appeal for that since users and vendors would be forced to use your coin and need to swap if they want to use your platform. Why don't you allow anyone to use any crypto they like, but provide an incentive to use your own token instead? For example, if they use/stake your token, then they'll get a 10% discount for every transaction.This idea is not new btw, lots of decentralized exchanges/marketplaces use the same incentive to encourage users to use their own tokens. But they don't limit the usage of other cryptos, so they can still earn from other sources. Btw, what your project does is act as a payment gateway for marijuana vendors, which will probably compete with other payment gateways such as BTCPay server. Have you seen them before, and find what makes your project stand out other than the support for other cryptos other than Bitcoin? CMIIW.

comments.body: If the main idea is to create an app that uses a Safe coin for sellers to make online payments, which coin would you like to use? Are you going to use one of the coins on the market?
